snippet: Seemingly healthy horses have been dying at an alarming rate in California. In the last 16 months, seven horses under the care of the trainer Bob Baffert have died suddenly, necropsies revealed.
abstract: Team of investigators open inquiry into alarming rate of unexplained deaths among racehorses in California; trainer Bob Baffert has had seven horses die suddenly in 16 months.
lead_paragraph: Seemingly healthy horses have been dying at an alarming rate in California. In the last 16 months, seven horses under the care of the trainer Bob Baffert have died suddenly, necropsies revealed.

headline.seo: California Examines Puzzling Trend of Horses’ Sudden Deaths
headline.main: California Examines Puzzling Trend of Horses’ Sudden Deaths
headline.print_headline: California Examines Puzzling Trend of Horses’ Sudden Deaths
